Energy-Efficient Washing Machine: Implement an energy-saving feature that adjusts the temperature and spin speed based on the fabric type and load size, reducing energy consumption and lowering utility bills.

Automated Fabric Sorting: Add an automatic fabric sorting system that uses sensors and machine learning algorithms to identify the type of fabric and sort it accordingly, eliminating the need for manual sorting and saving time.
Smart Laundry App: Develop a mobile app that allows users to remotely monitor and control their washing machines, receive notifications when cycles are complete, and even schedule washes in advance.
Eco-Friendly Detergent Dispenser: Include an eco-friendly detergent dispenser that uses reusable pods, reducing plastic waste and making the washing machine more environmentally friendly.

Customizable Wash Cycles: Allow users to create their own custom wash cycles based on fabric type, care instructions, and desired level of cleanliness, providing more flexibility and control over the washing process.
